name: Garfield's Armageddon Prophecy
description:
Please note that this game has moments with loud noises, flashing imagery, and jumpscares.

From the creators of the hit game "Garfield's Armageddon Delusion", there comes a new horror - the sequel.

It has all the aspects that made the original all so enthralling - a maze, an enchanting story, horrifying ambience, and the orange cat himself. However, it also contains exciting new features, such as:

  • Frighteningly realistic graphics
  • Two unique endings
  • Items to collect
  • Puzzles to solve
  • A new character
  • Much more lore

This world is beyond salvation - but maybe, just maybe..

You can still manage to play the role of a hero?

It all rests in your hands.
developers: Two Makes One of a Kind
